statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT aircraft_id, date, fuel_quantity FROM fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Jet Fuel';
SELECT date, fuel_type, distance_traveled FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT aircraft_id, fuel_quantity FROM fuel_consumption WHERE distance_traveled > 1000;
SELECT AVG(fuel_quantity) AS avg_fuel_quantity, MAX(fuel_quantity) AS max_fuel_quantity FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Jet Fuel' AND fuel_quantity > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT aircraft_id, SUM(fuel_quantity) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY aircraft_id ORDER BY total_fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT aircraft_id, AVG(distance_traveled) AS average_distance FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY aircraft_id HAVING AVG(distance_traveled) > 500 ORDER BY average_distance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT aircraft_id, date, fuel_quantity, distance_traveled FROM fuel_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND fuel_type = 'Gasoline' ORDER BY aircraft_id, date ASC;
SELECT aircraft_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM fuel_consumption WHERE distance_traveled IS NOT NULL GROUP BY aircraft_id HAVING total_records > 10 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT aircraft_id, model FROM Aircraft WHERE model = 'Boeing 747';
SELECT registration, model FROM Aircraft ORDER BY registration DESC;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption WHERE gallons_consumed > 100;
SELECT aircraft_id, date_consumed FROM FuelConsumption WHERE aircraft_id = 1 ORDER BY date_consumed ASC;
SELECT registration, model FROM Aircraft;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft WHERE aircraft_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(gallons_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed, fuel_type FROM FuelConsumption GROUP BY fuel_type;
SELECT aircraft_id, fuel_type, gallons_consumed FROM FuelConsumption WHERE date_consumed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY aircraft_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(gallons_consumed) AS avg_fuel_consumed, model FROM FuelConsumption INNER JOIN Aircraft ON FuelConsumption.aircraft_id = Aircraft.aircraft_id GROUP BY model HAVING avg_fuel_consumed > 100;
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_model, fuel_capacity FROM Aircrafts;
SELECT airline_name, country FROM Airlines;
SELECT flight_id, aircraft_id, flight_date, fuel_consumed FROM Flights;
SELECT * FROM Aircrafts WHERE fuel_capacity > 5000;
SELECT airline_name, country FROM Airlines WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY airline_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Aircrafts WHERE fuel_capacity > 5000;
SELECT aircraft_model, fuel_capacity FROM Aircrafts WHERE aircraft_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Flights WHERE fuel_consumed BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY flight_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Airlines WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY airline_name ASC;
SELECT aircraft_model, fuel_capacity, flight_date FROM Aircrafts JOIN Flights ON Aircrafts.aircraft_id = Flights.aircraft_id ORDER BY flight_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM aviation_companies;
SELECT company_name FROM aviation_companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT flight_id, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flights WHERE fuel_consumed > 1000;

SELECT company_name, aircraft.registration_number, flights.departure_airport, flights.arrival_airport FROM aviation_companies JOIN aircraft ON aviation_companies.company_id = aircraft.company_id JOIN flights ON aircraft.aircraft_id = flights.aircraft_id;

SELECT company_name, flights.flight_date, refuel_date, fuel_quantity FROM aviation_companies JOIN aircraft ON aviation_companies.company_id = aircraft.company_id JOIN flights ON aircraft.aircraft_id = flights.aircraft_id JOIN fuel_logs ON flights.flight_id = fuel_logs.flight_id ORDER BY fuel_logs.refuel_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM aviation_companies;
SELECT company_name, company_id FROM aviation_companies WHERE company_id > 100;
SELECT aircraft_id, registration_number, fuel_capacity FROM aircraft ORDER BY fuel_capacity DESC;
SELECT flight_id, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flights WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK' AND arrival_airport = 'LAX';
SELECT log_id, fuel_quantity, refuel_date FROM fuel_logs WHERE fuel_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY refuel_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_type, manufacturer FROM Aircraft WHERE aircraft_type = 'Boeing';
SELECT flight_id, flight_date, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM Flights WHERE flight_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, contact_person, email FROM FuelProviders WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, fuel_type, quantity FROM FuelTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_type, registration_number, manufacturer FROM Aircraft;
SELECT flight_id, aircraft_id, flight_date, departure_airport, arrival_airport, fuel_consumed FROM Flights WHERE departure_airport = 'New York';
SELECT transaction_id, flight_id, transaction_date, fuel_type, quantity FROM FuelTransactions WHERE fuel_type = 'Jet A1' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, contact_person, phone_number, email FROM FuelProviders WHERE provider_name LIKE '%Fuel%';
SELECT record_id, fuel_type, price, effective_date FROM FuelPriceHistory WHERE price > 3.5 ORDER BY effective_date ASC;
